heading: HR00785
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE STATUS OF THE DISTRIBUTION OF ELECTRICITY IN ILOILO CITY TO ENSURE THAT POWER DISTRIBUTION WILL NOT CEASE AND THAT THE PEOPLE OF ILOILO CITY WILL NOT BE AFFECTED
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-05-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00785
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE STATUS OF THE DISTRIBUTION OF ELECTRICITY IN ILOILO CITY TO ENSURE THAT POWER DISTRIBUTION WILL NOT CEASE AND THAT THE PEOPLE OF ILOILO CITY WILL NOT BE AFFECTED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LAGON, SONNY "SL" L.
DATE FILED : 2020-03-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-05-04
